code: import*as weatherConstants from'./../constants/weather';/** refesh weather list api */export var refeshWeather=function refeshWeather(){var params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};return{type:weatherConstants.REFESH_WEATHER,payload:{params:params}};};export var refeshWeatherFailed=function refeshWeatherFailed(error){return{type:weatherConstants.REFESH_WEATHER_FAILED,payload:{error:error}};};export var refeshWeatherSuccess=function refeshWeatherSuccess(data){return{type:weatherConstants.REFESH_WEATHER_SUCCESS,payload:{data:data}};};
